properties.entry: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT ORDER_NO , PRODUCT_NAME , ORDER_POPTION , ORDER_PAMOUNT , PRICE , TO_CHAR(ORDER_DATE, 'yyyy-mm-dd') "ORDER_DATE" FROM SP_ORDERPRODUCT JOIN SPMY_ORDER USING(ORDER_NO) JOIN TB_PRODUCT_UD USING(PRODUCT_NO) ORDER BY ORDER_DATE DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
